apple_vendor_description: This couple emoji on Apple devices features a man with a neutral skin tone and a woman with a rich, dark skin tone, both embraced and connected by a vibrant red heart. Apple's design language imbues them with a gentle 3D sheen and soft highlights, emphasizing their affectionate bond.  The composition, with its smooth gradients and rounded forms, conveys a sense of unity and love, making it a heartfelt way to express partnership and affection in digital conversations on Apple devices.
